_header: When Fortune list give her assent
_description: Fortune rules both high and low — a roundel in fourteen lines

CULFf16.First Lines:
When fortune list yeue here assentwhat is too deme þat may be
                    doo…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…Thus is my schort a viseamentAs hyt comyth so lete it
                    goWhen ffortune
